entries.arrived_at_loc: You have arrived at the location. Take the battle to Nova's forces and destroy them.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Alert! Enemy vessels detecting incoming at attack speeds.>
entries.first_attack: Be on the alert, pilot. Enemy fighters are heading your way at attack speeds. Someone must have tipped them off. Take them all out.
entries.found_loc: Coordinates loaded into your nav computer. Proceed to location.
entries.mission_complete: They have stopped sending ships via that shipping lane. Good work, return to base.
entries.outofrange: Return the hyperspace point, you need to be there to stop them as they arrive.
entries.outofrange_failed: Looks like they were too much for you, return to base. We need to rethink our strategy.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Remain at the location until you have completely eliminated all the ships in the area.
entries.quest_location_d: The location is inside Ord Mantell near the edge of the system.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Once you have arrived at the location, wait for all the ships to arrive. They might be heavily guarded.
entries.quest_reachpoint_t: Wait for the ships to start arriving
entries.split_quest_alert: Prepare to move to the next of Nova's rallying points.
entries.title: Orion: Hold off Jonas Nova's fighters.
entries.title_d: Jonas Nova is rallying his forces. Fight them and hold off their attack until we can regroup.
entries.trans_update: Transmission Update: <%DI percent of scheduled craft have arrived.>
